column4: i have a source code a program designed on windows and it works pretty well designed with c++ can make i a deb file and run it without using wine? (Say its a browser i made)
i designed .exe app for windows and it works pretty well designed with c++ can i make it a .deb file and run it without using wine? (Say its a browser i made)
